title: Daily internet usage per capita worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by device
summary: Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Mobile, and lastly, 2. Desktop.
Mobile reported the lowest Time in minutes about 32.0 in Year 2011
The greatest difference of Time in minutes between Desktop and Mobile occurs at Year 2018 and the smallest difference occurs at 2013.
